definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Please prescribe some tranquilizers for me.

sentences.chinese: 瑜伽，她说，“是我的镇定剂。”

sentences.english: Sex is the safest tranquilizer in the world.
sentences.chinese: 性爱是世界上最安全的镇定剂。

sentences.english: And the red ones are tranquilizer and blood - splatter darts.
sentences.chinese: 红色的是镇定剂和血液缓流飞镖。

sentences.english: Sex is the safest tranquilizer in the world. IT IS 10 TIMES MORE EFFECTIVE THAN VALIUM.
sentences.chinese: 性爱是世界上最安全的镇定剂，药效超过安定10倍。
也许你需要一些镇定剂。

sentences.english: Demonstrate appropriate use of analgesics and sedatives in trauma patients.
sentences.chinese: 示范在外伤患者身上能够适当的使用止痛剂与镇定剂。

sentences.english: You're having a premature mid-life crisis. You need a tranquilizer.
sentences.chinese: 你提前进入中年危机，你需要吃镇定剂。

sentences.english: I cried so much I had to be sedated.
sentences.chinese: 我哭得很厉害，要靠镇定剂才能安静下来。

sentences.english: Rossi had sedated Mushu and pulled on the stange object.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯先给木须施打镇定剂，然后拉出那个奇怪的物体。

sentences.english: Sex is around ten times more effective as a tranquilizer than Valium.
sentences.chinese: 十次性爱比镇定剂烦宁更有效。

sentences.english: Anxiolytics (tranquilizers) include a large resort, like antidepressants.
sentences.chinese: 镇定剂中包含了大量的抗抑郁的物质。

sentences.english: Sex is the safest tranquillizer in the world.
sentences.chinese: 性爱是世界上最安全的镇定剂。

sentences.english: Most of that improvement seemed to happen during the first four weeks.
sentences.chinese: 而改善通常发生在服用镇定剂的前四周。

definition: fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
